prompts.prompt:
Using the Transformer model from TensorFlow as described in the tutorial at https://www.tensorflow.org/text/tutorials/transformer, adapt it for multi-step time series forecasting. The requirements are:

1. 60 input time steps with 10 input features each, representing 5-minute intervals for a total of 5 hours.
2. Predict the next 6 hours at 1-hour intervals, resulting in 6 output time steps.

Ensure the Transformer model is adapted to handle these specific time series forecasting requirements.
